text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump •
Trump: “Anybody who wants a test, can get a test.”
•
“Capitol physician says he doesn't have enough tests for all senators — he doesn't have the equipment to do either rapid or widespread testing of the 100 senators who return to work Monday...”
•
